Title: 39622 - # Best Tech Gadgets For Summer 2016
Direction: 675 Words. List 4-8 different tech gadgets that are essential for summer. Discuss items such as digital cameras, solar powered beach bags, waterproof speakers or phone cases, phone chargers, smartwatches, etc. Make sure to talk about why these tech gadgets are essential for the summer and highlight some of their best features. Your target audience is people who are interested in technology. You can place the target URL in the section where you mention a digital camera as an essential gadget for the summer and its benefits and features. Please make sure to include at least 2 links to non-competitor products.
Anchor Text: best camera branded variation (client name + keywords)
Extra Writer Notes: Example: best digital camera from Sony
